Articles.Content: By the way, how is the GameData folder going?

I decided to challenge myself...

And decided to make a MODERN BIPLANE

It uses electric charge.

Electric charge = modern.

(ironically, the engine design resembles the older biplanes (Ki-10, Fury, He-51, Cr.32, Curtiss O-1, nothing from russians.))

Edited June 12, 2014 by KotDemopan

Need a tank?

Currently has Laztek, IR, and Skillful, B9 lights and TT modular wheels.

http://i.imgur.com/xsZy7c1.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/kHDzvm0.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/JiYY9Oq.jpg

75mph top speed, and it has a coaxial 7.62mm MG and a low profile.

see?

TT modular wheels are awesome....

see?

TT modular wheels are awesome....

They are when you put enough engines with them... lol

By the way, how is the GameData folder going?

Done, apart from B9. I can't seem to find the fixes.

Done, apart from B9. I can't seem to find the fixes.

There is a repack of it somewhere with fixes already in it. I was just looking for it but cant find it.

Found the interim pack....

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79611-B9-Aerospace-interim-maintenance-pack

Edited June 12, 2014 by Hodo

There is a repack of it somewhere with fixes already in it. I was just looking for it but cant find it.

Found the interim pack....

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79611-B9-Aerospace-interim-maintenance-pack

Thanks a lot, Hodo! I'll add that to the GameData folder as soon as I get home.

Do we want all parts or just the Aero ones?

They are when you put enough engines with them... lol

but good is also neede for balance, especially on high speed.

or just the right tire set config, i've built a driter once...

Imagine if this game had Tech-progression/Carrer-mode-Progression

[Hawker Fury -> Gladiator II -> Spitfire Mk 1 -> Spitfire Mk 127-something(not a real spitfire) -> Meteor -> B9 Stuff]

[biplanes with a bomb -> Propeller planes with a bomb(or a big bomber with biplane parts) -> Firespitter bombers with the specific parts -> B9 bombers -> Orbital Bombers]

[Helicopters with ONLY the weaker fuel engine/electric engine(no FS2Fs) -> Helicopters with but not limited to the weaker fuel engine/electric engine -> Helicopters that can use the Russian Bear Engine -> VTOLs]

Or for the Tank-experts: [T-18/MS-1 -> T-26 -> T-50 -> T-34 -> T-34-85 -> T-44 -> T-54 -> T-62 -> T-72 ->T-90] Or... [T-18/MS-1 -> T-26 -> T-28 -> KV-1 -> KV-1S -> IS-1/2 -> IS-3 -> T-10/IS-10]

Edited June 12, 2014 by KotDemopan

I would have a plane for this. It's one of my best fighters.

After MCA Labs dele... i mean got his files stolen by a red spy, we redesigned the F-11 by using the XF-11 protoype. This is the better, more struttier, more powerful F-11 A2

Still a heavy/ground attack plane capable of maneuvring well, fitted with heat seeking missiles and bomb, and 2 more 30mm than before! The engineers never liked the invisible struts and prefered not to put any.

Mods:B9,Skilful,TT Wheels, TV Aerospace. The SPH pictures are a bit different because i realised the tail winglets didnt move

Javascript is disabled. View full album

This version features armored engines

- - - Updated - - -

And count me in. MCA labs can make good planes. We just don't count all those that crashed but who cares

Edited June 12, 2014 by MCAsomm
horndgmium, when do you think we can start?

I've been watching this for a while, and I was wondering if I could join in the near future. I just finished cobbling together my new PC and should have it up and running in a couple of days, so I wouldn't actually be able to participate for a few days.
Put me on the red team; I like that color better.
could i be in red? we like Reliable Excavation-Demolition better at mca labs

could i be in red? we like Reliable Excavation-Demolition better at mca labs

I get it...
So when is this starting? I have a screen recorder (even though it will lag a bit) ready for launches and stuff.
Oh, and when can we have the gamedata folder? Some of these mods, I'm not to sure if my computer can handle them.

This can start whenever the gamedata folder is good to go. I've updated the post with the new teams, let me know if I've left anyone out.

I won't be able to host a server due to my terrible Internet, but if someone creates one then all can play on it.

What time zone works best for everone? Like I said, I'm in GMT-8 but I don't really matter since I can't play :/

Addition: I've been playing around with mce and 2 million credits is pretty low to start, so I seriously recommend setting up bases (flags) or other ways to get a higher budget, right off the bat.

Edited June 13, 2014 by horndgmium
I would also like to play. I have some fun ideas as to base design. I don't really care what team I'm on. I've been playing (mostly stock+mechjeb, but occasionally with other mods) for 11 months.

I would also like to play. I have some fun ideas as to base design. I don't really care what team I'm on. I've been playing (mostly stock+mechjeb, but occasionally with other mods) for 11 months.

Added; you have the best username on this website.

Thanks!

(10char)
I can't host the server either
Horn, do we only want the Aero parts from B9 or the entire B9 pack? The OP is quite unclear
My bad, I suppose the whole pack unless anyone doesn't want that
I'll need a texture reduction pack for all those mods
